name: Fall of Gods
description:
Three, once strong, gods are enclosed in the body of one. They need to kill two strong, evil gods to get new bodies for themselves.

Controls: WASD - walk
LMB - shoot
Spacebar - use skill of the current hero
1, 2, 3 - change of heroes
Esc - exit
Tab - inventory
H - fast heal
R - discard the object to which the mouse is pointing.
Shift + R - throw away all the objects pointed to by the mouse.
E - open the chest / take the item / look at the goods of the seller / buy
LMB in inventory - choose a weapon
